name: Shimano Sil-Tec Road SLR Brake Inner/Outer Cable Set
categories: Sil-Tec Road SLR Brake Inner/Outer Cable Set
description: A complete road brake cable set for Road SLR (Shimano® Linear Response) systems.Stainless steel inner cables are Teflon coated.Outer casing is lined with a polymer sheath for a smooth operation of the cable inside.Contains 5mm diameter housing (140cm). 1.6mm inner cables 205, 80, and 100cm.  4 pieces for installing.
